text: The women's 400 metres event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 9 March in Madrid. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Natalya Chistyakova '''' |Gisela Ahlemeyer '''' |Tatyana Arnautova '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 from each heat (Q) qualified directly for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Women's 400 metres
